Translations.Text: avaru (ibrahim) helidaru; khanditavagiyu nivu mattu nim'ma purvajaru spastavagi tappu dariyalliruviri
avaru (janangadavaru) helidaru; nivenu nam'ma balige satyavannu tandiruvira? Athava nivu kevala tamase maduttiruvira
avaru helidaru; akasagala hagu bhumiya odeyanu hagu avugalige rupa nididavane nijavagi nim'ma odeyanu. Idakke nim'ma munde nane obba saksiyagiddene
allahanane, nivu illinda horatuhoda balika i nim'ma vigrahagala kuritante (enu madabekendu) nanu ondu yojane hakikondiddene
konege avaru avellavannu nuccunuru madibittaru. Adare janarella adara balige maralalendu doddadondannu bittu bittaru
avaru (uravaru), ‘‘nam'ma devarugalige higella madidavanu yaru? Avanu khandita akrami’’ endaru
Kelavaru, ‘‘ibrahim embobba yuvakanu avugala kuritu matanaduvudannu navu keliddeve’’ endaru
avaru, ‘‘avanannu janara munde tanniri. Avaru kannare kanali’’endu ghosisidaru
‘‘o ibrahim, nam'ma devarugalige i gati odagisiddu nine?’’ Endu avaru vicarisidaru
avaru (ibrahim) helidaru; ‘‘avara (a vigrahagala) hiriyanada avane i krtyavannu esagiruvanu. Avugalige matanaduva sakti iddare nivu avugalodane keli nodiri.’’
Aga avaru svatah tam'mannuddesisi, ‘‘nijakku nive akramigalu’’ endu helikondaru
a balika tale taggisi ‘‘avugalu matanaduvudilla embudu ninage gottideyalla?’’ Endaru
avaru (ibrahim) helidaru; nivenu, allahanannu bittu, nimage yavude labhavannagali nastavannagali madalagadavarannu pujisuttira
nimagu allahanannu bittu nivu pujisuva ellavugaligu dhikkara. Nivenu alocisuvudillave
avaru (paraspara) helidaru; nim'ma devarugalige neravagalu nivenadaru maduvavaragiddare, avanannu suttu bidiri
‘‘o agni, ninu ibrahimara palige tannagagu hagu ksemavagibidu’’ endu navu adesisidevu
avaru (uravaru) avarige (ibrahimarige) hani madalu yojisiddaru. Adare navu avarannu (uravarannu) sampurna solisibittevu
mattu navu avarannu (ibrahimarannu) hagu lut‌rannu raksisi, lokadavarigella navu subhavannittiruva nadige kalisidevu
navu avarige (ibrahimarige) is‌hak‌rannu nididevu mattu heccuvariyagi (mom'maganagi) ya'akub‌rannu nididevu. Mattu navu avarellarannu sajjanaragisiddevu

Navu avarannu, nam'ma adesa prakara janarige margadarsana niduva nayakaragi madidevu mattu navu avarige, satkarmagalannu tilisuva mattu namajhannu palisabeku hagu jhakatannu pavatisabekennuva divyavaniyannu kalisiddevu. Avaru nam'manne aradhisuvavaragiddaru
innu lut‌rige navu adhikaravannu jnanavannu nididdevu mattu tira aslila krtyagalannu esaguttiddavara nadininda navu avarannu raksisidevu. Khanditavagiyu adu ondu dusta janangavagittu
avarannu (lut‌rannu) navu nam'ma anugrahada vyaptige serisikondevu. Avaru khandita obba sajjanaragiddaru
i hinde nuharu nam'mannu karedu prarthisidaga, navu avarige uttarisiddevu mattu navu avarannu hagu avara kadeyavarannu ondu ghora vipattininda raksisidevu
nam'ma vacanagalannu sullenda janangadavara virud'dha navu avarige neravadevu. Adu khandita bahala dusta janangavagittu. Navu avarellarannu mulugisi bittevu
innu, davud mattu sulaimanaru. Avaribbaru ondu holada kuritu tirpu nidalu horatiddaru. Ratriya vele kelavara adugalu alli (a holadalli) meddiddavu mattu avara tirpige navu saksigalagiddevu

navu sulaimanarige adara vastavavannu sucisidevu mattu navu avaribbarigu janmeyannu hagu jnanavannu nididdevu mattu navu davudara jote (nam'ma) pavitravannu japisuvante parvatagalannu hagu paksigalannu avarige adhinagolisiddevu. Idannella nave madiddevu
nimagagi, nim'ma yud'dhagalalli nim'mannu raksisuva (ukkina) kavacavannu nirmisuva kaleyannu navu avarige kalisidevu. (Innadaru) nivu krtajnaraguvira
Mattu navu birugaliyannu sulaimanarige adhinagolisidevu. Adu avara adesadante, navu samrd'dhiyannittiruva neladedege calisuttittu. Navantu ellavannu ballavaragiddeve
saitanara (jinn‌gala) paiki avarigagi (sulaimanarigagi, sagaradalli) mulugi baruva hagu itara kelasagalannu maduva kelavariddaru. Nave avara raksakaragiddevu
mattu ayyubaru ‘‘nanu bhari sankastadalliddene mattu ninu atyadhika karune toruvavanagiruve’’ endu tam'ma odeyanannu kugi prarthisiddaru

konege navu avarige uttara nididevu, avara sankastavannu nivarisidevu. Mattu navu avarigu avara maneyavarigu, avara jotegidda avarantaha itararigu nam'ma kadeyinda visesa anugrahavannu hagu bhaktarigagi upadesavannu karunisidevu
hageye isma'il hagu idris hagu jhul‌kiphl. Avarellaru sahanasilaragiddaru
